question.title: Marking direct dependency as runtime and excluding transitive dependencies in test
question.body:
(avro % Runtime).excludeAll(
      ExclusionRule(organization = "com.fasterxml.jackson.core"),
      ExclusionRule(organization = "org.apache.commons"),
      ExclusionRule(organization = "org.slf4j"),
    ),
     (avro % Test).excludeAll(
        ExclusionRule(organization = "com.fasterxml.jackson.core"),
        ExclusionRule(organization = "org.apache.commons"),
        ExclusionRule(organization = "org.slf4j"),
      ),

This does not exclude dependencies from the test task and I'm unsure if it is even possible. Aside from the fact this highlights a problem between my runtime and project dispositions, it seems like I should be able to do this exclusion from 'test'. Using sbt 1.10.10

I was hoping that the excluded dependencies would also be excluded in the 'test' task.

question_comments.body: Define the exclusion once globally, then use Runtime and Test configurations.
